pageProduct.name: Thankyou Exfoliating Body Bar with Lemon Myrtle and Poppy Seeds 100g
pageProduct.description:
General Information

EXFOLIATING - We’ve packed this body bar with only the good stuff! With poppy seeds, Australian red clay and lemon myrtle leaves, this life-changing bar will naturally exfoliate and hydrate your skin - leaving you feeling clean and amazing for the day ahead! The best part? The entire range exists to help end global poverty. MADE WITH LOVE IN AUSTRALIA VEGAN FRIENDLY NOT TESTED ON ANIMALS MADE WITH NO PRODUCT WASTAGE MADE WITH RECYCLED CARDBOARD MADE WITH RECIRCULATED WATER

Warnings

But first, read this Patch test before use. Store below 25°C and in a clean dry place. Keep out of direct sunlight and pooled water. For external use only. Avoid contact with your eyes. If you experience irritation after use, please discontinue.

Common Uses

Soap Bar

Ingredients

Sodium Palmate, Sodium Palm Kernelate, Water, Glycerin, Olive Fruit Oil, Fragrance, Lavandin Oil, Sandalwood Oil, Coconut Oil (Organic), Poppy Seeds, Lemon Myrtle Leaves, Shea Butter, Vitamin E, Kaolin (Australian Red Clay), Sodium Chloride, Carbon Black (Natural), Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate.

Directions

The how-to Massage the body bar over your wet skin to create a lather. Rinse off and pat dry.
